title: Emergency Water Main Repair - Takoma Park
address: 602 Ethan Allen Avenue in Takoma Park
full_text:
Laurel, MD – December 30, 2022: WSSC Water is making emergency repairs to an 8-inch water main at 602 Ethan Allen Avenue in Takoma Park. Customers will lose water service while the water main is being fixed. Repairs will be made as quickly as possible.
Sign up for the Customer Notification System to receive alerts of water main breaks by visiting wsscwater.com/cns.
We apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for being a valued customer.

title: Emergency Water Main Repair - Capitol Heights
address: 6180 Old Central Avenue at Rollins Avenue in Capitol Heights
full_text:
Laurel, MD – December 29, 2022: WSSC Water is making emergency repairs to a 12-inch water main at 6180 Old Central Avenue at Rollins Avenue in Capitol Heights. Customers may have been experiencing low water pressure or no water in this area. Customers will lose water service while the water main is being fixed. Repairs will be made as quickly as possible.
